#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{   int t,j,n,ele,i,a[10001],max=0;
    cin>>t; //number of test cases;
   while(t>0)
   {
      cin>>n; //number of elements in array
      memset(a,0,sizeof(a)); 
      max=0;
      for(i=0;i<n;i++)
      {
      cin>> j;
      
      
      a[j]++;               
    
      }       
        for(i=0;i<10001;i++)
        {
          if(a[i]>max)
          {
                      
           max=a[i];
           j=i;            
          } 
          else if (a[i]==max && i<j)
          {
            j=i;
          }                  
        }    
      
     cout<<j<<" "<<max<<endl;   
     t-=1;
   }
    
    fflush(stdin);
    getchar();
    return 0;
}
